item.description:
Summer will be soon over!!!

For this photoshoot, we will experience with how to take photo of the models under the strong Sun on the beach.

To attend you need to have an external flash (the on-camera flash will not do). Prefer lens with focal length 70 to 135 but others would work. And most important thing is you able to get up early to drive to Gloucester beach to meet at 8AM.

This photoshoot is limited to 10 photographers.

The three models who will be at the photoshoot are:

1) Amanda

2) Caitlin

3) Colleen

 

I think all the models have nice tattoos so you will have good images of beach-bikini-tattoos combined :)

The beach I selected is a small beach with a rocky area on the side that we could get great photos there.

See the following link for direction to the beach(we will meet at 8AM at the visitor Center). The parking cost will be $10.00.

Half Moon Beach address: 25 – 99 Hough Ave Gloucester, MA 01930

http://files.meetup.com/830833/Half%20Moon%20Beach.pdf
item.name: Rock Beach Bikini Photoshoot
